content.text: 0) In a large mixing bowl, combine flour and salt.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "combine"@27:34 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "flour"@35:40 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "salt"@45:49 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a large mixing bowl"@6:25 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 1) In a small mixing bowl, beat egg yolks on low while adding cream.
3) Add to flour mixture; combine on low speed, then beat on medium-high until smooth.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Add"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( "flour mixture"@10:23 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-3-1 "combine"@25:32 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:mnr ( "on low speed"@33:45 / OTHER )
	)
	:inform ( ac-3-2 "beat"@52:56 / AC
		:until ( cond-3-0 "until smooth"@72:84 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:mnr ( "on medium-high"@57:71 / OTHER )
	)
)

content.text: 4) In another small mixing bowl and with clean beaters, beat egg whites on high until stiff peaks form.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "beat"@56:60 / AC
		:instrument ( tool-4-0 "clean beaters"@41:54 / TOOL )
		:loc ( tool-4-1 "another small mixing bowl"@6:31 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "egg whites"@61:71 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-4-0 "until stiff peaks form"@80:102 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:mnr ( "on high"@72:79 / OTHER )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Bake in a preheated waffle iron according to manufacturer's directions.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:loc ( tool-6-0 "a preheated waffle iron"@11:34 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:mnr ( "according to manufacturer's directions"@35:73 / OTHER )
	)
)

content.text: 7) Serve with warm maple syrup or fresh fruit in season.
